definition: encircling the city (of walls, ring road etc)/around the city
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
surname Huan
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The hotel is conveniently located at the junction of Jingyang Road and West Ring Road right in the center of Luyuan District.
sentences.chinese: 酒店地处于绿园区中心的景阳大路与西环城路交汇处。

sentences.english: Simultaneously the citizen's recreational action has spurred the out comers'participation.
sentences.chinese: 市民的环城游憩活动同时又带动了外来旅游者的参与。

sentences.english: That's right. The effect is not going to be isolated inside the Beltway.
sentences.chinese: 是的，影响不仅是在环城高速内部。

sentences.english: Progress is being made in building a new highway around the city.
sentences.chinese: 新环城公路的建设正在向前推进。

sentences.english: It was at Circle City, ere the year was out, that Pete's apprehensions were realized.
sentences.chinese: 年底之前，在环城时，彼得的疑虑被证实了。

sentences.english: My car's engine died at the beltway, can you help me ?
sentences.chinese: 我的车在环城路上死火了，你能帮帮忙吗？

sentences.english: More belt highways should be constructed so as to relieve the traffic pressure.
sentences.chinese: 为缓解交通压力再多修几条环城公路。

sentences.english: The flying snowflakes have put heavy coats on the trees of the city ring park.
sentences.chinese: 纷纷扬扬的大雪给环城公园的树木穿上了“棉衣”。

definition: ring road/circle line (e.g. rail or subway)
Nanhu district of Jiaxing city 嘉興市|嘉兴市[Jia1 xing1 shi4], Zhejiang
city district/urban area
Qiaoxi District (various)/Qiaoxi District of Shijiazhuang City 石家莊市|石家庄市[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 Shi4], Hebei
Xincheng or Hsincheng township in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], east Taiwan
Xinhe county in Xingtai 邢台[Xing2 tai2], Hebei
brook/rivulet
Lakeside district/Hubin district of Sanmenxia city 三門峽市|三门峡市[San1 men2 xia2 shi4], Henan
lake front
park (for public recreation)/CL:個|个[ge4],座[zuo4]
Donghu district of Nanchang city 南昌市, Jiangxi
Xincheng District of Xi'an 西安市[Xi1 an1 Shi4], Shaanxi/Xincheng District of Hohhot City 呼和浩特市[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4 Shi4], Inner Mongolia
Nancheng county in Fuzhou 撫州|抚州, Jiangxi
Luqiao district of Taizhou city 台州市[Tai1 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
road bridge
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
